text: directed by michel gondry and starring a
boisterous cast of real New York City
teenagers the we and the I takes place
on a public bus after the last day of
school we ingest anything you in his
review aO Scott writes as much as it
rebels and meanness the wit of a
well-timed put-down and the joy of a
good prank the we in the AI is finally
more interested in love and in a
sweetness that peeks out from behind the
bravado and sarcasm it's a Valentine to
New York it's crowded loud and rough but
there's a room for everyone and if you
listen closely you'll hear the poetry in
the noise take this is my number
